# solid

**Type Property**

Indicates a collision between solid UI objects of medium flexibility.

## Declaration

```swift
static let solid: SensoryFeedback.Flexibility
```

## Getting flexibility values

- **rigid**: Indicates a collision between hard or inflexible UI objects.
- **soft**: Indicates a collision between soft or flexible UI objects.

items.description: Indicates a collision between hard or inflexible UI objects.
items.name: rigid

items.description: Indicates a collision between soft or flexible UI objects.
